documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Privacy Policy
VGM Quiz ("we", "us" or "our") provides this Privacy Policy to inform our users ("users", "your" or "you") of our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use and disclosure of information we receive.

When you use a VGM Quiz Service at a Social Networking Site ("SNS"), you allow VGM Quiz to access your profile information in accordance with the policies and terms of the SNS.

Such information may include, but is not limited to, your first and last name, your profile picture, your SNS user ID and respective user IDs of your friends that are connected to the Service.

VGM Quiz may use some or all of your profile information as part of the features of the Service. The information you allow VGM Quiz to access is affected by the privacy settings that you have set at the SNS. You may control and learn more about these privacy settings at the applicable SNS.

For example, we may use information collected from you in any one or more of the following ways :

- to register your VGM Quiz account and allow you to play it
- to notify users of in-game updates
- to promote in-game players achievements or provide leader boards
- to analyze user traffic and gather statistical information


WE DON'T SHARE YOUR INFORMATION WITH ANYONE.

If you require any more information or have any questions about our privacy policy, please feel free to contact us by email at support@vgm-quiz.com

© 2012-2023 French Freaks · Privacy · Terms · FAQ

documents.name: Terms of use
documents.text:
Terms of use
Please read these terms of use carefully before using any part of the service. By using the service, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not agree to all of these terms, do not use the service. If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us by email at support@vgm-quiz.com
1. Scope
Every Service of VGM Quiz is subject to these Terms of use, as long as there are no explicit exeptions. These Terms of Service include VGM Quiz' privacy policy, located at : www.vgm-quiz.com/policy and may be updated or adjusted by us from time to time.
2. Registration conditions
The services of VGM Quiz can only be used after registering as a member or by using a VGM Quiz service at a Social Networking Site. Membership is open to everybody who allows VGM Quiz to access their basic-information and registration is obviously free. The membership account is non-transferable.
3. Responsibility for minors
Minors are permitted to register at VGM Quiz and play if they are aware of the consequences of the usage of their data and understand the importance of such consent. When the legal guardians accept the usage of these services by minors, they are aware of the consequences of missuse of the services of VGM Quiz through the minors.
4. Warranty and Limitation of Liability
The use of VGM Quiz services is at the own risk of the user. VGM Quiz takes no liability for lost information and data of the member. Information and advices that a user gathers at the services do not approve of VGM Quiz' warranty, except where expressly stated. The liability for accidental governmental action, labor dispute, force majeure, natural disasters, accidental damage and setting of the game server is excluded.
5. Changes to services
Restrictions, extensions and other changes to these services by VGM Quiz are allowed at any time and are also subject to the following terms and conditions.
6. Copyright Complaints
ALL THE MUSICAL EXTRACTS HEARD IN THE PRESENT GAME ARE PROTECTED BY AUTHOR'S RIGHTS AND ARE THE EXCLUSIVE PROPERTY OF THEIR RESPECTIVE AUTHORS.
According to the article L.122-55 of the French Intellectual Property Code, VGM Quiz reserves the right to use the musical content for recreational and cultural purposes. If you believe that any materials on the site infringe your copyrights, notifications of claimed copyright infringement should be sent to VGM Quiz Support Team.
VGM Quiz does not permit copyright infringing activities and infringement of intellectual property rights on its Website, and will remove all Content if properly notified that such content infringes on another's intellectual property rights.
If you believe that your work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please provide VGM Quiz' copyright agent the written information specified below :
  • A physical or electronic signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright interest that is allegedly infringed
  • A description of all of the copyrighted works that you claim has been infringed upon
  • A description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the VGM Quiz website, including, a URL of the specific location of the infringing material
  • Information sufficient to allow us to contact you including, at a minimum, your address, telephone number, and e-mail address
  • A statement by you that you have a good-faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. and
  • A statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright owner or authorized to act on the copyright owner's behalf.

7. Termination of membership
VGM Quiz is entitled to terminate the contract on participation and to terminate the services with any member at any time. Furthermore VGM Quiz is entitled to terminate any account without prior warning. The membership can be cancelled by emailing the VGM Quiz Support Team and/or blocking the application on Facebook.
VGM Quiz is owned by the indie game company French Freaks

© 2012-2023 French Freaks · Privacy · Terms · FAQ
